clauses.clause_text: MINUTES OF THE ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING OF {{company_name}} HELD ON {{meeting_date}} AT {{meeting_location}} STARTING AT {{start_time}}.
Present: {{attendees_list}}. The Chairman noted that a quorum was present in accordance with the Company's Constitution and Act 992.

The following ordinary business was transacted: (1) Presentation of the Audited Financial Statements for the year ended {{year_end_date}}; (2) Re-appointment of {{auditor_name}} as Auditors; (3) Re-election of retiring Directors: {{retiring_directors}}.
A final dividend of {{dividend_per_share}} per share was declared and approved for payment to shareholders on the register as of {{record_date}}.

I, {{shareholder_name}}, being a member of {{company_name}}, hereby appoint {{proxy_name}} or failing him, the Chairman of the meeting, as my proxy to vote for me and on my behalf at the Annual General Meeting to be held on {{meeting_date}}.

Certified as a true record:

____________________
{{chairman_name}}
